description: Fancy a gourmet seafood pasta in just 25 minutes? Try this light and tasty spaghetti recipe with tender squid, blistered Solanato tomatoes and fresh basil.
keywords: Pasta,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Squid dishes,Seafood,Low sugar,Seafood pasta,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,One-pot,Soy free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Dinner Made Easy,Low fat,Peanut free
name: One-Pan Tomato & Squid Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L Massel gourmet vegetable style liquid stock
350g thawed squid tubes, cut into 1cm-thick rings

recipeInstructions.text: Place stock in a large, deep, heavy-based frying pan and bring to the boil over medium-high heat.

Break spaghetti in half, then add to pan and stir to combine. Return to a simmer, then reduce heat to medium. Cook, uncovered for 12 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until spaghetti has absorbed almost all of the stock and is tender.
Stir in squid and tomato, then cook for 2 minutes or until squid is just cooked through.
Divide spaghetti mixture among bowls. Top with parmesan and basil, then season with pepper. Serve.
